function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ethical dilemmas in public decision-making that conflict with public values in the context of managing water systems","Impact":"Potential for unjust or inequitable decisions that favor certain values over others, leading to public dissatisfaction and lack of trust","Mitigation":"Transparent and inclusive decision-making processes, involving diverse stakeholders and ethical review boards","Technologies":"Ethical AI decision support systems, Multi-Criteria Decision Analysis (MCDA) tools","People":"Public stakeholders, decision-makers, policy implementers","Owner":"Government agencies, policy-making bodies"},{"Description":"Tradeoff between public health and economic preservation in pandemic policymaking","Impact":"Potential for neglecting one aspect over the other, leading to negative social and economic consequences","Mitigation":"Balanced approach with public health guidelines and economic support measures, transparency in decision-making","Technologies":"Epidemiological models, economic impact assessment tools","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, business owners, general public","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, economic advisory bodies"},{"Description":"Influence of computational models on decision-making, leading to oversight of important real-world aspects","Impact":"Potential for biased or incomplete decision-making based on the limitations of computational models","Mitigation":"Validation of models with real-world data, consideration of multiple models and scenarios, ethical review of model limitations","Technologies":"Data validation tools, multiple model integration platforms, ethical AI validation frameworks","People":"Data scientists, decision-makers, model developers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, ethical review boards"}]}
